description.value:
Level: 9
Category: Exploration
Time: 1 minute
Duration: Instantaneous
Component Cost: 150 gp and 2 healing surges
Market Price: 800 gp
Key Skill: Arcana

Make an Arcana check against each lock and restraint within 10 squares of you. If your check succeeds against the DC to break, open, or escape the lock or restraint, that lock or restraint is opened. If you exceed the DC by 5 or more, you can choose to break the target instead of just opening it.

Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
